short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to provide details of the next upcoming Marvel movies and TV shows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fast and lightweight chrome extension that provides basic details and a countdown of days until the next upcoming marvel movie and tv releases.

Details Include: 
- Title
- Movie/TV
- Days Until Release
- Release Date
- Summary

Please leave a review if you enjoy!

Disclaimer:

Upcoming Marvel Releases is in no way affiliated with Marvel Studios, LLC or the Walt Disney Company.
